Overview Description:  
Received the following error messages when discovering a DS8000 SS

1/4/07 1:38:21 PM BTADS0000I Starting Discover Process collectStorageSubsystemsFromCIMOM , with Device Server RUN ID 46 , and Job ID 148 .
1/4/07 1:38:22 PM HWN021727I Aperi discovery starting on CIMOM https://9.11.213.146:5989.
1/4/07 1:38:24 PM HWN021725I Aperi discovered/rediscovered a device with name IBM.2107-1302541/Storage Facility Image IBM.2107-1302541 on CIMOM https://9.11.213.146:5989.
1/4/07 1:38:24 PM HWN021503E An internal error occurred, please try again. If the problem persist, please contact IBM service.
1/4/07 1:38:24 PM HWN021503E An internal error occurred, please try again. If the problem persist, please contact IBM service.
1/4/07 1:38:24 PM HWN021728I Aperi discovery on CIMOM https://9.11.213.146:5989 is complete.
1/4/07 1:38:39 PM BTADS0035E The execution of the job failed with: org.eclipse.aperi.common.api.ServerException: HWN021503E An internal error occurred, please try again. If the problem persist, please contact IBM service. .
1/4/07 1:38:39 PM BTADS0001I Discover Process with Device Server RUN ID 46 and Job ID 148 is complete with Status= 4 , Return Code= 1 .

The traceAperiDeviceServer.log had the following error messages:

2007.01.04 13:27:06.500-08:00 ERROR org.sblim.wbem.cim.CIMException: CIM_ERR_INVALID_CLASS(Remote exception at the CIMOM:CIM_ERR_INVALID_CLASS: The specified class does not exist: "IBMTS_ObjectManager")
	at org.sblim.wbem.xml.XMLDefaultHandlerImpl.startElement(XMLDefaultHandlerImpl.java:1041)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.next(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:365)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.<init>(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:119)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClientXML.getEnumeration(CIMClientXML.java:1590)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClientXML.enumerateInstances(CIMClientXML.java:541)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClient.enumerateInstances(CIMClient.java:908)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClient.enumerateInstances(CIMClient.java:958)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.disk.common.util.thread.DiskMgrThread.run(DiskMgrThread.java:257)   org.eclipse.aperi.disk.common.CIM.CIMClientWrapper executeSvcCall CIMOM Registrator 
2007.01.04 13:27:07.375-08:00 ERROR org.sblim.wbem.cim.CIMException: CIM_ERR_NOT_FOUND(Remote exception at the CIMOM:CIM_ERR_NOT_FOUND: The requested object could not be found: "CIM_IndicationFilter.CreationClassName="CIM_IndicationFilter",Name="CIM_InstCreation for 9.43.237.27",SystemCreationClassName="CIM_ComputerSystem",SystemName="spyder.storage.tucson.ibm.com"")
	at org.sblim.wbem.xml.XMLDefaultHandlerImpl.startElement(XMLDefaultHandlerImpl.java:1041)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.next(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:365)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMEnumerationImpl.<init>(CIMEnumerationImpl.java:119)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClientXML.getEnumeration(CIMClientXML.java:1590)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClientXML.deleteInstance(CIMClientXML.java:459)
	at org.sblim.wbem.client.CIMClient.deleteInstance(CIMClient.java:591)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.disk.common.util.thread.DiskMgrThread.run(DiskMgrThread.java:257)   org.eclipse.aperi.disk.common.CIM.CIMClientWrapper executeSvcCall CIMOM Registrator 
2007.01.04 13:27:07.578-08:00 ERROR org.sblim.wbem.cim.CIMException: CIM_ERR_NOT_FOUND(Remote exception at the CIMOM:CIM_ERR_NOT_FOUND: The requested object could not be found: "CIM_IndicationFilter.CreationClassName="CIM_IndicationFilter",Name="CIM_InstModification for 9.43.237.27",SystemCreationClassName="CIM_ComputerSystem",SystemName="spyder.storage.tucson.ibm.com"")
	at org.sblim.wbem.xml.XMLDefaultHandlerImpl.startElement(XMLDefaultHandlerImpl.java:1041)
 
Steps to Reproduce:
         Run CIMOM discovery to a CIMOM agent with DS8000 SS
      
Actual Results:  
         The CIMOM discovery failed.                         
     
Expected Results:
         The DS8000 SS will be discovered and can be probed
                                 
Build Date & Platform: 
     Aperi-20070103.085736.zip
The failed DS8000 CIMOM is at version 5.2.1.78, This CIM agent is incompatible with the versions of Aperi R0.2.  Aperi code will be fixed in the future release.
*** Bug 176244 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
